review: I came for second opinion about my tooth problem to Siddharth, since he is close to my home, I decided to take treatment from him.  During the treatment I experienced he took difficult course (Post and core) to save my tooth instead of implant,  I find him genuine, sincere  and hard working. Thank you Siddharth!

review: The doctor has a very positive aura and an astounding experience and knowledge in dentistry. 100% recommended to everyone reading this out. Having such honest and skilled doctors is indeed a blessing for our society. We need many like him and I definitely look forward to for all my future dental check ups. Thank you sir.
